sentences.sentence: The green light is go after Sweden's moderate party was given the go ahead to try and form a new government, despite coming third in last week's elections.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: But the big question on everyone's lips is what role the far right's within Democrats will play who came ahead of the moderate party in second place.

sentences.sentence: If they are a parliamentary backing outside of the government, it will still give them quite substantial veto power over policies that is pursued by the government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: And this isn't only at a domestic level, but also at an EU level.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: They are a Eurosceptic party, which means that they are reluctant to give any other new issues to be part of European decision-making when they are deemed better to deal with at the national level.

There is consensus, however, among all parties in Sweden that it should join NATO and maintain its alignment with the EU regarding Russia and the war in Ukraine.

In her ruling, she said that the state did not meet its legal obligation to share evidence with Saeed's legal team that could have bolstered his defense when he was on trial for the 1999 murder of high school student Ha Min Lee. Prosecutors have 30 days to decide if they want to pursue a new trial or dismiss the case.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: In July, they banned women from wearing coats that did not cover the knees, ripped jeans and brightly coloured outfits.

sentences.sentence: On the day of Queen Elizabeth's final farewell, the emotion was palpable, and so was the anticipation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Everyone wanted a glimpse of the procession and one last chance to say goodbye.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: And when she came, people here could feel the weight of history.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: I wanted to get the moment to actually see the Queen's coffin passing me so I held the phone, got it in position and then ignored the phone and just looked straight at the coffin but to be honest, I broke down straight away because I just felt like losing my grandmother, you know.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: A grandmother, a leader, a symbol symbol so much meaning attributed to the queen and her international fame people came from all over the world for this moment i think for me it was a much needed closure in such beautiful pageantry form that we've we don't see over in the states but for me it's helping to heal the heart.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It will take time for some here to heal and to measure whether those who stayed behind will be able to fill such big shoes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: For now, many will perhaps come to understand a notion the Queen herself so often referred to, that grief is the price to pay for love.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Annelies Borges in London for Euronews.
